solution_line_template: The cost of the food is ${eggs_cost} + ${pancakes_cost_initial} + ${cocoa_mug_cost} + ${cocoa_mug_cost} = $<<{eggs_cost}+{pancakes_cost_initial}+{cocoa_mug_cost}+{cocoa_mug_cost}={initial_food_cost}>>{initial_food_cost}.
The original total cost, including tax is ${initial_food_cost} + ${tax_amount} = $<<{initial_food_cost}+{tax_amount}={total_cost_with_tax_initial}>>{total_cost_with_tax_initial}.

Ben increases the total cost to ${total_cost_with_tax_initial} + ${additional_pancakes_cost} + ${additional_cocoa_cost} = $<<{total_cost_with_tax_initial}+{additional_pancakes_cost}+{additional_cocoa_cost}={final_total_cost}>>{final_total_cost}.
